name: Shuttle among stars
description:
For ScoreSpace GameJam

Parkour in the Space!

Shuttle between Outside and Inside!

When the countdown ends, the masks will become platforms and you need to reach the red ball before the time runs out.

Be careful when shuttling!

Move: WASD

Jump: W/SPACE

Do not touch the meteor

Time-limited for some bugs(the meteors) and we'll fix it after jam~
